![](/img/survey.png){width="259"}

The Statistics Teaching Inventory (STI) is an instrument designed to assess the instructional practices and beliefs of instructors of introductory statistics courses. Initially designed as part of the NSF-funded project [Evaluation and Assessment of Teaching and Learning about Statistics (e-ATLAS; NSF DUE-1044812 & 1043141)](https://www.nsf.gov/awardsearch/showAward?AWD_ID=1044812).

<br />

## Instrument and Citation

Versions 2 and 3 of the STI instrument, along with a further description of the development process, can be found at: <https://osf.io/r4eag/>. Please use the citation on the OSF site when using the STI instrument.

<br />
